Delaware was the first state to ratify the U.S. Constitution. And that Constitution sets up a process for if and when the President of the United States is believed to have done things that are wrong or illegal. 
 
That process starts in the House of Representatives.

I am also troubled at the idea that some of those who have taken similar oaths to defend the U.S. Constitution, including the President of the United States, may have not taken that oath seriously and made a mockery out of what is a solemn obligation.
